title: Hello! My name is Prince
paragraphs: In 2022, I started my career as a systems developer, working with various programming languages and technologies, including JavaScript, Python, React.js, Django, Flask, Git, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB. I used agile methodologies such as SCRUM and KANBAN to manage demands and ensure more efficient deliveries. During this period, I developed and maintained systems, improved my programming skills, and dedicated myself to providing high-quality solutions to meet clients' needs.
